description:
The Ultimate 2D Game Engine

GameMaker is a tool designed to empower you and your team to make new and innovative games as well as prototype ideas in the fastest and most intuitive way possible across multiple target platforms. It is intended primarily as a tool for making 2D games - although 3D games are perfectly doable - and comes with a number of tools and editors to help you realize your dreams and ideas, with your final project being ported across multiple platforms from the same initial base resources.
This legacy release notes page has been replaced by releases.gamemaker.io - which is the home for all release notes and supporting guides/links going forward.
- Follow the link above for more information on the current Monthly/LTS/Beta releases and a number of older Monthly/LTS releases since this old release notes page stopped being updated (including download links for the installers)
- Always confirm your Required SDKs are correct for the specific version of GameMaker you're installing and also review your antivirus/firewall/OS account permissions against our permissions guide! You can find links to both of these guides to the left of the release notes site.
- If you just want to quickly see what's already planned for upcoming (Open) releases or went into existing (Closed) releases, you can do this on the "all Milestones" list page
